name: web-server
description: Host remote web-GUI for our simulation.

scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-scss && npm run clean
scripts.build-js: npm run babelify && npm run browserify && npm run beep && npm run clean
scripts.build-scss: sassc client/src/sass/stylesheet.scss client/static/css/stylesheet.css 2> /dev/null || true && npm run beep

author: Antoine Murat
